title: Bug 120216 - Group dialog should be shown even when dataset is not set
OB: Currently, when a table report item is added but the dataset is not set, attempting to create a new table group does not show the group dialog.
EB: The expected behavior is that the group dialog should be shown even when the dataset is not set.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Add a table report item without setting the dataset. 
2. Try creating a new table group.
